'''2.0.895''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) or '''2.0.897''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on May 30, 2017.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-5583}}: Windows: "Minecraft launcher has stopped working" on game startup.
* {{bug|MCL-7321}}: When clicking "PLAY" Minecraft can't load.
* {{bug|MCL-7333}}: Minecraft Launcher 2.0.847 hangs at Preparing after clicking the Play Download 1.11.2 - Latest release.
